description: Think Stouffer's without the freezer While it can be enjoyed straight from the pot, this macaroni and cheese has a slightly looser sauce than the stovetop variety to allow for thickening in the oven Bread crumbs, while optional, make it truly spectacular.
title: Classic Baked Macaroni and Cheese
title_page: Classic Baked Macaroni and Cheese Recipe - NYT Cooking
text: Think Stouffer's without the freezer. While it can be enjoyed straight from the pot, this macaroni and cheese has a slightly looser sauce than the stovetop variety to allow for thickening in the oven. Bread crumbs, while optional, make it truly spectacular.
